node.title: The Secret of Lasting Success
node.description: Many are attempting to find success and fulfillment in life. We see the shattered wrecks of lives all around us – lives dashed on the dangerous reefs of mirage-like shorelines they almost but never quite reached. Yet this is nothing new, for even the biblical King Solomon set out in a similar vain quest. Explore the biblical principles that lead to lasting success – they may be more simple than you think!
